title: Eye-gaze Guided Multi-modal Alignment for Medical Representation Learning
details: C Ma, H Jiang, W Chen, Y Li, Z Wu, X Yu, Z Liu, L Guo… - The Thirty-eighth Annual …
abstract: In the medical multi-modal frameworks, the alignment of cross-modality features presents a significant challenge. However, existing works have learned features that are implicitly aligned from the data, without considering the explicit relationships in …
